title: Large-Scale Social Learning-Based Freshwater Management Strategy Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Water Resource Management Concepts and Organizational Decision-Making Experience
context.additional_context: Situational requirement for managers to overcome institutional barriers within organizations and establish freshwater management strategies through community collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflicts among stakeholders in freshwater management processes using a social learning framework.
Learners can derive three or more insights into how institutional constraints within an organization affect social learning by applying participatory reflection techniques.
Learners can develop and evaluate freshwater management implementation plans considering institutional contexts through virtual scenario-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
